column1: Traffic reports will resume Monday January 9 at 6:30 a.m.

column3: Road and Lane Closures Scheduled for Rose St and E Vine St:
column4: Monday 1/9 from 3 a.m. to 3 p.m., weather permitting, for major storm sewer repairs.

column3: Road and Lane Closures Scheduled for Rose St and E Vine St:
column4: Rose St - All northbound lanes (direction from E High St to E Vine St) will be closed.  Detour via High St and Limestone.

column3: Road and Lane Closures Scheduled for Rose St and E Vine St:
column4: E Vine St - The middle and right lanes will be closed in the intersection.  Right turns to Rose St will be allowed.

column3: Road and Lane Closures Scheduled for Rose St and E Vine St:
column4: Please see the traffic pattern diagram.
